Pain medicine called anesthesia did not yet exist so surgery was performed while patients

writhed and yelled in pain.

Ow!

I can’t believe

he’s operating so fast!

He definitely

is a doctor!

Wah!

I can’t stand the sight

of blood.

I don’t think I’m cut out for this.

Both times Darwin performed surgery

at school, he had to run out before it was completed because he couldn’t bear

the experience. He never attended another

surgery class again.

Charles! Where are you going?

The surgery isn’t even

over yet!

Afterward, apart from Professor Thomas Hope’s chemistry class, Darwin lost all interest in the medical classes at Edinburgh University.

29
